snippet: The judge said at the hearing in London that there was “no substantial reassurance” that Navinder Singh Sarao was not a flight risk.
abstract: London Judge Ross Cranston denies appeal by futures trader Navinder Singh Sarao to reduce his bail after being accused of helping cause stock market 'flash crash' in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The judge said at the hearing in London that there was “no substantial reassurance” that Navinder Singh Sarao was not a flight risk.

headline.main: No Reduced Bail for ‘Flash Crash’ Trader
headline.print_headline: No Reduced Bail for ‘Flash Crash’ Trader
